sourcesContent:
import { Component } from "@angular/core" import { NavbarComponent } from "./components/navbar/navbar.component" import { HeroComponent } from "./components/hero/hero.component" import { FeaturesComponent } from "./components/features/features.component" import { ReviewsComponent } from "./components/reviews/reviews.component" @Component({ selector: "app-root", standalone: true, imports: [NavbarComponent, HeroComponent, FeaturesComponent, ReviewsComponent], templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrl: "./app.component.css", }) export class AppComponent { title = "TechFlow" }
